name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Some people say they love the rain. I wish I could enjoy being stuck in traffic for an extra 45 minutes on the way to work.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Nov. 2 is Election Day. Americans will cast their votes and everything will remain exactly the same as it was before.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The White House canceled President Obama’s visit to a Sikh temple because you have to cover your head, and they thought pictures of Obama in a turban may fuel rumors that he’s a Muslim. It’s the same reason he canceled Turban Tuesdays at the Rose Garden.
